description: NO FEES TO THE BUYER If you are looking for a centrally located apartment, very well located, bright and with a great distribution…. this is your apartment THIS HOUSE IS SPECIAL BECAUSE Which is located in a magnificent area of Alcobendas surrounded by all services and transport at your fingertips. DISTRIBUTION The home is located on the third exterior floor of the building. It has a hall that leads to a large and bright living room with access to a terrace overlooking a quiet street. A large kitchen, another hallway through which you access two large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a full bathroom that serves these rooms and a third en suite with a dressing room. COMMUNICATIONS The home is located in the urban area of Alcobendas, a city to live in located north of the capital. Connected through the A1 by car, Renfe suburban Line C4, Metro Line 10 and several bus lines. Likewise, it is located just 10 minutes by car, 30 minutes by public transport, from the Madrid Barajas Adolfo Suarez airport. COMMERCIAL AND LEISURE AREA In this town there are important shopping centers such as La Vega (Alcampo among others), Carrefour, Río-Norte (Decathlon, Toys'r'us, Décimas,... ), Diversia Leisure Center, Moraleja Green (CC Sánchez Romero among others). It also has two business parks: La Moraleja and Arroyo de la Vega, where important companies have established their headquarters, especially related to new technologies. SCHOOLS AND HOSPITALS In the central area of the town of Alcobendas you can find all kinds of daycare centers, schools, public, subsidized and private universities, as well as health centers, being very close to the Infanta Sofía Hospital. Basic characteristics of the property: •108 m² built, •3 rooms •2 bathrooms •Terrace •Built-in wardrobes •Second hand/good condition •Individual heating: Natural gas •Reinforced door •park * 10 m2 storage room NOT included in the price €15,000 Edifice •3rd floor exterior * Parking in the same building •With elevator Energy certificate •Consumption: E 275 •Emissions: E 58 See energy rating label.

description: PRIMER LEVEL INMOBILIARIA sells this magnificent apartment that is totally exterior and has all large rooms. It is very well located, a few meters from the "Marqués de la Valdavia" metro station, regular bus lines and 450 meters from the Renfe Station. It is a central apartment, with a good location with respect to local shops, restaurants, libraries and other services. The urbanization has a private area with a children's play area, gardens and elevator. The house is very bright and has a very pleasant distribution, with the following configuration: As we enter, we are welcomed by a large hall, on the right hand side, it is made up of 3 bedrooms and a bathroom, and to the other side, it has a large Separate living room and a wonderful kitchen with large windows to the outside and very usable, since it has no corners with lost meters. The heating is independent, with natural gas and a Saunier Duval brand digital boiler has recently been installed. With 20 years of experience in the real estate sector, our team is at your disposal to help you with everything you need. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this wonderful property!
